thread.title: Bungling European Union displays US flag with EXTRA STAR during Mike Pence’s visit
thread.title_full: Bungling European Union displays US flag with EXTRA STAR during Mike Pence’s visit

title: Bungling European Union displays US flag with EXTRA STAR during Mike Pence’s visit
text:
EPA Pence seemed oblivious of the rather garing error 
The Brussels version of the US flag had three rows of nine stars and three rows with eight stars each. The American flag features a total of nine alternating rows of five or six stars.The EU flag featuring 12 stars in a circle against a blue background was configured correctly. And the American flag had the right number of stripes - 13. EPA All of the flags on display were wrong 
It isn’t as though the American flag is new, it has had 50 stars since Hawaii became a state in 1959.The EU Council did not immediately respond when asked about the error with the misplaced star-state. EPA EU officials seemed pleased after the talks 
Although officials claim they “were encouraged by what they called Pence's clear assurances, including the US agreeing to help hold the European Union together after Brexit”.Donald Tusk, who chairs the European Council of EU leaders, told reporters that Pence had given him affirmative answers to three questions on Trump's support for: the current system of international law, NATO and "the idea of a united Europe". Remoaner-in-chief: Blair's Views on Brexit Fri, February 17, 2017
